    • Uses of Player in edu.txstate.hearts.model

      Subclasses of Player in edu.txstate.hearts.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Agent 
      class  AgentAggressive
      Contains rules & strategies for the most difficult AI agent The basic strategy of the AgentAggressive is to play the Queen of Spades or a Heart on a user if possible, otherwise determine the best card to play by finding the highest card in the smallest suit that is under the current risk threshold.
      class  AgentDetermined
      This class implements the logic for a medium level AI.
